text.section: If a court orders that a deed of any kind shall be executed, it may appoint a trustee to execute the deed.

Until the trustee executes a deed, the decree:
If passed in the county where the land lies, has the same effect as an executed deed; and
If passed in another county, has the same effect as an executed deed if recorded in the county where the land lies within 6 months after the date of the decree.
